size.description: Size of the food portion in unspecified unit

calories_kcal.description: Energy content of the food in kilocalories (kcal)

fats_g.description: Fat content of the food in grams (g)

sod_mg.description: Sodium content of the food in milligrams (mg)

carb_g.description: Carbohydrate content of the food in grams (g)

fiber_g.description: Dietary fiber content of the food in grams (g)

sugar_g.description: Sugar content of the food in grams (g)

protein_g.description: Protein content of the food in grams (g)

vitA_g.description: Vitamin A content of the food in grams (g)

calcium_mg.description: Calcium content of the food in milligrams (mg)

thiamin_mg.description: Thiamin (Vitamin B1) content of the food in milligrams (mg)

zinc_mg.description: Zinc content of the food in milligrams (mg)

potassium_mg.description: Potassium content of the food in milligrams (mg)

magnesium_mg.description: Magnesium content of the food in milligrams (mg)

vitE_mg.description: Vitamin E content of the food in milligrams (mg)

vitK_mcg.description: Vitamin K content of the food in micrograms (mcg)

vitC_mg.description: Vitamin C content of the food in milligrams (mg)

vitB6_mg.description: Vitamin B6 content of the food in milligrams (mg)

copper_mg.description: Copper content of the food in milligrams (mg)

carotene_mg.description: Carotene content of the food in milligrams (mg)

carotene_mcg.description: Carotene content of the food in micrograms (mcg)

cryptoxanthin_mcg.description: Cryptoxanthin content of the food in micrograms (mcg)

lycopene_mcg.description: Lycopene content of the food in micrograms (mcg)

cholesterol_mg.description: Cholesterol content of the food in milligrams (mg)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in food nutrition.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the nutritional information of the baby food, please predict the quality rating.
prompt.answer_prompt: Quality rating 1[0], Quality rating 0[1], Quality rating 3[2], Quality rating 2[3]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in food nutrition.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the nutritional information of the baby food, please predict the caloric value (in kcal).

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the nutritional information of the baby food, please predict the fat content (in grams).

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the nutritional information of the baby food, please predict the protein content (in grams).
